description: Control y Prevención del VIH/sida en Las Americas

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national capacity for inclusive governance and coordination of national HIV responses, and for the protection of human rights of people affected by HIV, including women and other vulnerable groups
subproject.description:
Main project results are the following:
a)	Experiences in the 3 priorities areas identified in participating countries by September 2007.
b)	One plenary meeting convened in Cuba by June 2007.
c)	At least 3 interactive fora convened in selected countries for sharing experiences by November 2007.
d)	Final report developed and disseminated with recommendations for collaborative strengthening of HIV/AIDS programs in the countries by December 2007.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: HIV/AIDS PREVENTION&CONTROL

title: Trust Fund Perez Guerrero HIV/AIDS Prevention in America
